1.content:
During his first year as a student enrolled at Beacon Academy, Jaune Arc was... well... kind of out of place. He was the bottom of the barrel as far as his classmates were concerned, and while he did have friends, they also tended to mock his less-than-stellar combat abilities, and inability to use semblance

They thought it was all in good fun, and that Jaune didn't take it personally... but in truth he did. It really bothered him that he was so outclassed, and mocked even by his so-called friends and team mates.

One day, Jaune happened upon an online hypnosis course. His curiosity piqued, he decided to give it a go and learn the methods of hypnotism, thinking that domination over minds may give him the edge that he never had before.

He spent months learning techniques, studying various sources, taking classes online, and rehearsing inductions.

Time rolled by, and his second year at Beacon had begun. Maybe a week in, Jaune finally got up the courage to try out his newfound ability.

The question is... who would he go after first?

Jaune was sitting on his bed, looking down at his pocket watch, not entirely sure who to hypnotize... and then the answer actually came right to him.

"Hey Jaune!" Ruby yelled out from behind him. Jaune jumped in a startled fear and tumbled down onto the floor.

"D-don't sneak up on me like that! Ow..." he replied.

"Oh. Sorry! I was just bored and was looking for someone to hang out with. What was that thing in your hand? It looked fancy."

Jaune held the pocket watch up in front of Ruby.

"It's my pocket watch I uh... I've been studying hypnosis and bought this to practice but--"

"That's so cool!" she cried out in excitement.

"Yeah. But I've never been able to actually try to hypnotize anyone."

Ruby pondered for a moment, then her eyes lit up.

"You can try it on me... IF... you promise I can use it to mess with my teammates later." she chuckled.

"Deal!" Jaune replied with a grin. Ruby sat down on Jaune's bed.

"Alright. Now I'm--"

"Gonna swing your watch in front of my face until I'm all hypnotized and spacey. I know! I know! Let's just get started!" she beamed in anticipation. Jaune chuckled nervously and began to swing the watch in front of Ruby.

"Alright Ruby. Just watch this swing back and forth in front of your eyes. Let it take you down into a deep trance. Just listen to my voice and let it guide you into a hypnotic slumber. Just let yourself relax and... uh... Ruby?" he questioned, looking at her in confusion. Ruby's chin had hit her chest, her shoulders were slack and she was breathing heavily. Her eyes were closed and she had a content smile on her face.

"Alright. So you're messing with me right?" Jaune said, annoyed. Ruby did not reply.

"...Fine. If you aren't gonna take this seriously then... ugh. Just get up and go back to your room."

She slowly stood and shambled out. Jaune collapsed onto the bed, annoyed. He sat there for a moment, somewhat angry that Ruby was mocking him like this. He decided he was going to go get some food to hopefully eat his sorrows away. As he left his room he saw... Ruby. She was in her room, yes. But she was just standing there, still seemingly asleep.

"Wait... is she ACTUALLY hypnotized..? If she were messing with me she wouldn't have just kept standing there in the hope I'd leave my room..." he thought to himself. He approached her and ordered her back to the JNPR dorm, closing the door behind him.

"She's... actually hypnotized. I get the feeling this will not work anywhere NEAR as easily on anyone else. Ah well. May as well do something with it to see if this works well."

What does he do?

13.content:
Jaune had come to his decision... but had no real plan for how he was going to pursue it.

He'd decided on Blake. The issue is that he knew there was no way in hell Blake would ever agree to be hypnotized in a million years. He couldn't work the "do it for a friend" angle because the two of them weren't exactly close. He couldn't use a problem solving tactic because Blake would never even tell him about her problems. He couldn't issue a challenge because she wasn't that hot headed. It was all too difficult...

He spent hours mulling over ideas. But he stumbled onto something. In his studies he'd learned about subliminal messages. They weren't incredibly powerful, and would likely take a while to take full effect, but he knew that as his only real option. It was his hope that her extra two ears weren't just for show and may speed the process along.

Jaune created a small track of subliminal messages, and got a small speaker which me put right beneath Blake's pillows. If she discovered it she'd probably think nothing of it. It was just a small speaker playing what was more or less a very VERY light static. She'd probably assume it was a prank by Ruby or Yang.

Jaune had it all set up. The track gave Blake a single command. A trigger word he could use on her. "Cat nap". This would drop her into a trance and make her open to more suggestions. Plus, it's an easy phrase to slip into conversation.

Jaune waited and waited. About a week went by of these subliminal messages and Jaune decided to take the risk. Nora had rushed out to buy... well... Jaune didn't really understand it. Some weird thing only Nora would want, let alone understand, and Pyrrha and Ren got dragged along. So he sat next to his door, out in the hall, waiting for Blake to show herself.

Time passed by and eventually Blake approached her room, some light reading material in hand.

"Jaune... why are you sitting outside?" she sighed.

"I uh... locked myself out of the room." he chuckled.

"Why not go get a spare? I'm sure they have some. Or just call Pyrrha?"

"Pyrrha and the others are in the city. It'd be a while before they could get back. And I'd go down there but honestly I'm just too tired. All I wanted to do today was go into my room and take a little... cat nap."

As the words exited his lips, Blake's eyes went wide and glassed over. She dropped her book onto the floor. Jaune was shocked. It had worked! He opened the door to his dorm which, obviously, was never REALLY locked, and ushered the hypnotized girl inside.

He excitedly planned his next move, adrenaline filling him. What does he do?

Passing the doorway Jaune quickly locked the door behind them and let out a quick sigh of relief as now he’s safe to work in peace. Luckily for him he wasn’t lying earlier about his team being out in the city. Meaning he’ll be able to mess with Blake uninterrupted, or at least that what he hoped.

“Yes of course Jaune. My h-hypnosis m-mas.... w-wait what?” Blake seems like she was to completely follow this command but as she gets off the bed to proceed to bow she falters and stops before doing so.

“J-jaune... was I just... Why..: I was dancing... now I... what am I doing?” Blake puts her hand on her head in confusion as if she has a headache. Shaking her head in an attempt to focus.

Blake’s Eyes shoot wide open as she realizes what has been done to her but as her eyes glaze over, her shoulders slump, breath slows, her care for the issue slowly fades away as she no lingers finds the desire to fight it. Letting it cloud her mind and putting her back into trance.

One, two, three… awake!” He snapped his hands.

Ruby’s eyes shot open and she fell forward off the chair onto the ground. She was on all fours with her arms straight and her back legs bent. She looked around and puffed out her cheeks. A small croak escaped her lips and she started hopping around the room.

“I’m always surprised at how good of an actor people can be,” Blake commented. “The mind is truly a powerful thing.”

“If you’re going to do more stage hypnosis,” Yang said to Jaune. “Got to keep the excitement going.”

“Right,” Jaune agreed. “Let’s get Ruby back. Stop Hopping.” Ruby froze and jumped to her feet.

“That was weird, and awesome… but weird.” Ruby said to Jaune. “I was a frog. Hopping around was natural and I wanted to eat flies. Ew! But at the time I thought they were delicious.”

Jaune snickered.

“Hypnosis is amazing!” Ruby told him.

“Oh, I know, Ruby. I know.”

What next?

134332332121231322123333211231211131.content:
Jaune was having fun watching Team RWBY bicker with each other. It never got too far and it reminded him of his family back home. He was tempted to use the Cat Nap and have some real fun, but the night was young and he had another idea in mind. The girls seem to have fun with turning into animals and watching them was amusing to Jaune.

“You all know the drill, watch the coin…” Jaune put them all to sleep in no time. The constant build up helped a lot. “Let’s see, how do I want to do this?”

He didn’t want to keep hypnotizing them over and over again. It was a waste of time if he wasn’t showing off. There was also the limit to the animals he could think of. He wanted the girls to have some control over each other. The plan formed quickly once he set those parameters.

“Now, girls.” Jaune said, to the four girls slumped in the chairs in front of him. “When I snap my fingers and saw Awake, you all will wake up, fully alert. The only difference now is that whenever anyone in this room, says your name, followed by an animal, you will become that animal. Just like what you all experienced before. For example, if Ruby says, ‘Yang, Dog,’ you would become a dog, Yang. While an animal, you will believe you are that animal. When someone says your name followed by Human, you will return to your normal self. Example, if you were a dog Yang and Blake said, Yang, Human. You would return to normal. You will remember everything you experienced during your transformations. Only I will have the power to say Everyone followed by an animal. If I do, you all will become that animal. Do you understand?”

The girls nodded.

“Awake!” Jaune snapped his fingers and the girls immediately regained consciousness.

“So?” Ruby asked, looking around. “What did you do? I don’t feel any different.”

“I hope he didn’t make us think we are each other,” Weiss said. “I’ll be annoyed if I find out I’m really Yang or something.”

“Hey!” Yang cried out and Blake snickered.

“I gave you all a trigger, but it’s something you all control.” The girls looked at him confused and Jaune spent a couple minutes explaining what the commands were. “I thought it would be fun and it’s something we can do for a bit.”

“That’s…impressive.” Weiss muttered.

“Jaune’s the best hypnotist ever.” Ruby puffed out at her chest, glad her team was enjoying themselves.

“You don’t think this can be abused?” Blake pointed out warily and then saw the huge grin on Yang’s face. “Shit-…”

“Blake, Cat!”

"Oh come on Ruby, it's all in good fun." Yang chuckled.

"Well let's see how you like it then, Yang, mouse!" Ruby exclaimed At that Yang's eyes glazed and went on all fours and began squeaking like a mouse, the hypnotized Blake began to look at her like food.

"Blake, human!" She started, not wanting Blake to harm her sister, this immediately had her get up and snarled at Yang.

"Thanks Ruby, I owe you for that." Blake thanked looking at the hypnotized Yang acting like a mouse "I say we keep her like that as punishment."

"Works for me!" Ruby exclaimed "Is there any animal you want to become Blake?"

She scooted back and sat on her bed, with her knees tucked under her. She hooted a couple times and then her eyes traveled to Yang. A hungry look in her eyes. Yang the Mouse twitched her nose, squeaked, and ran behind Blake’s bed. Blake and Ruby laughed at her.

“Sure.” Jaune nodded. “This is more for you guys to have fun. I’m just watching and will turn people back if everyone transforms.” He realized turning Weiss into a predator with Yang as a mouse not be a good idea. However, he decided to remain silent and see how things played out.

“Ruby wants to be a lion,” Blake said. “Hmm, not sure what I want to be.”

“Hmm, if Yang’s a mouse and Blake’s a rabbit,” Ruby muttered. “Maybe I should become something small and fluffy? Oh, I know! A squirrel!”

“A squirrel?” Weiss deadpanned. “That’s not really fluffy, except the tail.”

“Shush!” Ruby demanded. “Turn me into one. Ah, wait! Tell me what it was being an owl first?”

“I felt like I could fly and see well,” Weiss reminisced. “Powerful too. I saw Yang as a mouse and I was prepared to go after her for dinner.” She shrugged. “Seems Jaune accidentally made us see each other as animals when we were animals.”

“Ruby, Squirrel.” Jaune said.

Ruby dropped down and crouched on her back legs. Her arms were pulled near her chest and her hands were bent forward. She made a chattering noise with her teeth and showed her front ones more often than needed. Out of nowhere, she bolted on all fours across the room, climbed Weiss’s bed and disappeared into her own.

“I think I have to try being hypnotized and see what being an animal is like.” Jaune said, after whistling. He was impressed. Yang was still hiding behind the bed and Blake was crouched on all four, ears twitching beneath her bow and twitching her nose.

“Looks like I’m the last one standing.” Weiss said. “What to do? What to do?”

Weiss snorted.

1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
“Well, if Weiss doesn’t want to feed them…” Jaune walked passed the girls to Weiss’s desk and pulled open the drawer where Ruby had grabbed the granola. “Jackpot!” Weiss had a lot of health food and Jaune took some baby carrots, trail mix, and an apple. He crouched down next to Blake, whose ears peaked up and she hopped away from him. “It’s okay, Blake. Want a carrot?”

Blake stopped and slowly turned around. Jaune realized even if they were animals, they still had some intelligence. Hypnosis couldn’t get rid of it all. They must have known he wasn’t a threat. Jaune held out the carrot and Blake slowly hopped toward him. He had to try not to laugh as he looked into her amber eyes. They seemed a little duller than usual, but there was a little suspicion there, along with hunter. Blake finally drew close enough and opened her mouth. Once she started nibbling on the carrot and realized Jaune wasn’t going anything, she seemed to relax.

“Good girl.”

Jaune gave her another carrot and left her to her own devices. He sat on the chair at Ruby’s desk and tossed a shelled peanut up into Ruby’s bed. There was some movement, then nothing. Jaune grinned and tossed up another piece. Again, he saw some movement than nothing. It took a third piece for Ruby to stick her head out, still chattering. Jaune held out his hand with another nut and Ruby slowly climbed down. She grew close and then her hand moved suddenly. She grabbed the nut and rushed back up into her bed fort.

“No need to be afraid, Ruby. I got more.”

He held out some more and Ruby came down again. This time, she started grabbing the nuts from his hand without running. She nibbled on each treat enthusiastically. Her eyes were also a little dull, but seemed to still have a lot of energy behind them. When Jaune was out, she sniffed his pocket, and ran back up into her fort.

“Hmm, guess I shouldn’t leave Yang out.” He took some granola that didn’t have any nuts and tossed them behind the other bed where Yang was. He saw her hair moving around and knew she was grabbing the food. “She’s going to haaaaatttteee me when she gets out.” Luckily, he had a failsafe still installed.

Suddenly, someone bumped into his backside and he turned to see Weiss on all fours looking at him. She exhaled a blast of air like a lot of horses did and stared at him. Her eyes were dull like the others and just seemed to hold interest.

“You want food too?” Jaune held out an apple and Weiss took a bit. He waited for her to chew, swallow, and take another bit. He let her keep up this a couple of times before she walked away. About half the apple was eaten and Jaune placed the remains on her desk.

“Well, now that the animals are fed, I should bring someone back. Hmm, I promised not to free Yang, so has to be one of the others. Blake was first the transform, but Ruby might be more fun in this situation. Weiss is probably going to yell at me a little, but I don’t want her to be really pissed at me.”

“I can revoke her privileges,” Jaune admitted. “But I have another idea.”

“Oh?” Blake raised an eyebrow. “Like what?”

“I agree what she did was wrong,” Jaune said slowly. “She knew Blake didn’t want to be a cat and part of being a hypnotist is respecting your subjects wishes. I think before we revoke her privilege, we give her a little more of a punishment then turn her back to normal. After that, if she doesn’t abuse her powers, she can keep them. If she tries, we remove them.”

“Okay…” Ruby nodded slowly. “What kind of punishment? We already are leaving her as a mouse. Did you want to do it longer like Blake suggested?”

“Part of this was to let you guys all experience being different animals,” Jaune pointed out. “What if we put Yang in the bathroom and turn her into a different animal? Keep her locked up there for a little while longer as something no one would really want to be? Like… an insect, or snake, or something else? You know, creepy things? Try to be creative.”

“If she’s locked up in the bathroom, we can change into carnivores without worrying about seeing her as a mouse,” Blake murmured. “I’m still a little upset at her, so it would be a good punishment. AND, she can’t be mad we excluded her from the fun.”

“Yang does need to learn to respect other people’s wishes,” Ruby agreed. “I’ve been a target for her way too many times.” She grinned devilishly. “Okay, what should we turn her into?”

“That’s up to you two,” Jaune told them. “I’ll help corral her into the bathroom, but you make the decision.” Jaune opened the bathroom door and Ruby and Blake helped chase Mouse Yang in. Weiss just watched them from the top bed. Jaune couldn’t wait to see how devious his friends could get.

Ruby and Blake had a quick discussion in hushed voices before deciding…

"Fly could work, but we have to make sure it's not something that'll cause her to leave the bathroom, a turtle maybe?" Ruby suggested.

"This is how it's going to work, you're going to spend some time as a hamster in here and should you choose to behave and use the gift I gave you responsibly I'll let you keep them and allow you to make amends, if not I'm revoking them."

“No.” Blake shook her head. “Didn’t occur to me. I don’t think animals really know their sex. It’s mostly they just find themselves attracted to another one of their species. Why? What brought this up?”

“Well, male and female lions are pretty different,” Jaune explained. “The male lions have the big manes, while the females look closer to house cats, just larger. I’m pretty sure Ruby was thinking of the male lions, but if you all subconsciously know you’re female, she might be a female one.”

“Huh, that’s an interesting point.” Blake agreed. “Should we pull her out and see?”

“I think she’s been wanting this for a bit, let her have her fun.” Jaune suggested. “Unless you want to try and tell me?”

“I suppose I wouldn’t mind,” Blake said slowly and nodded. “You can transform me and then pull me back?”

“Hmm.” Blake thought about it a moment. “I guess that’s fine. Just see if Ruby and I start fighting seriously and free us before anyone gets hurt. Most animals this won’t matter, but I admit it’s interesting to test out.”

“Okay, ready?” Blake nodded. “Blake, Lion, Male.”

Blake fell down to all fours like Ruby and stretched. Her eyes immediately swiveled to Ruby and she roared. Unlike Ruby, Blake’s voice was a little deeper and had some power behind it, though Jaune still had to laugh as it wasn’t nearly as loud as a lion or as fierce.

He also didn't want too many people getting controlled at once. He liked to slowly work in commands so they solidify better. Otherwise someone might wake up and freak out.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: Call in here and begin the next day

choices: Neo (But he doesn't know she's mute)
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
Jaune went back to his dorm room ready to call it a day, wondering who they will nab to have fun with. He rubbed his temple a bit as he continued walking until he heard a voice.

"Do you remember the plan?" The voice was definitely feminine he was curious as to what this was so he did some sneeking to where he heard the voice. He went as quiet as possible to the source to find four figures in the cafeteria looking at a raven haired girl. She had golden eyes and was wearing a normal school attire, across from her was a green haired girl with dark skin and red eyes looking on with intent. A silver haired man looking bored and a very unique looking girl one of her eyes was brown and the other pink, half of her hair was strawberry blonde while the other chocolate brown and she was wearing a vanilla like dress.

The unique looking girl looked erratically at her team leader before gleefully putting her hands behind her head.

"You don't need to repeat this every time Cinder, we got this." The man sounded annoyed.

"Shut up Mercury, when she talks you listen." The green haired girl hissed.

"Can it Emerald, we know what to do we're not incompetent." Mercury sighed.

"Speak for yourself." Emerald snarled. Mercury glared at her back.

"Enough." Cinder said and both of them immediately shut up "Need I remind you that we're on a tight schedule, find out what you can about the students on Beacon, find out who we need to worry about." She turned to the girl grinning from ear to ear.

"Neo, can I count on you to....deal with problems?" She asked. Neo grinned and gave a thumbs up acknowledging she'll do it, what only her teammates know is that she is mute. "Good, you have your assignments, now rest and don't you dare let anyone catch on to what we're doing." She glared at the last part and had fire light up in her hand for emphasis, causing the three to cower a bit.

"Y...yes Cinder." Emerald and Mercury replied with Neo nodding. The four of them made their way back causing Jaune to get out of dodge to avoid getting caught.

What was that about? He wondered, something about them was off. Thankfully he had his messages to rely on, maybe find a way to get one of them and have them talk the question though was who to pick?
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: Decides to try to place his own messages in som...

choices: Pretend to fall for Neo and give her the player as a gift.
Decide he really shouldn't get involved for now.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
From what he heard, Cinder was the ring leader of the group. He figured he would need the help of someone else. The multicolor girl seemed like a good choice. She seemed to be the one with the most freedom. The question was how to get them alone. He had a tape with subliminal messages, but that took days to work, probably. He had only tried it on Team RWBY for now. He had been planning to see how it worked on others.

Jaune thought about how to approach this problem.

He would have to get close to Neo somehow and present the tape as a present. He had disguised it as relaxing music. No one would be able to hear the commands normally, not even Faunus. It would take specialized equipment to do that if you knew where to begin. Since this really wasn’t a Hunter/Huntress strategy, as it didn’t work against Grimm, no one should be privy to it.

There was one way to get close to Neo. Jaune could pretend to have fallen for her and offer the music as a gift. Flattery might work, or he might get kicked in the nuts with his player smashed. Both were possible outcomes. He also didn’t know anything about his girl, except she was kind of cute. Little on the short side, but seemed to have a decent rack and skills.

Jaune shook his head.

He was getting paranoid. There was a chance they were just talking about spying in Beacon students to figure out who was strong so they could think of a plan to beat them in the Vytal festival. Not getting caught obviously meant that rumors spread. If people knew they were spying, they could be on guard and not show off their skills. Jaune could understand that. It was necessarily right in it’s own way, but it wasn’t against any rules.

Plus, one of Team RWBY might hypnotize one member of that team and he could question them afterwards.

He could also try to come up with another idea.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: Neo (But he doesn't know she's mute)

choices: Following Team Ruby and their choices (RC on who)
Skip to a few days later (Neo fully programmed and RWBY with their girls)
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
Jaune decided to give the giving her a gift idea a try, at best he's being paranoid and he'll grab himself an admittedly cute girl to have fun with. At worst he's gut feeling is right and he might need to nip this in the but. Either way he went to find Neo and formulate his plan.

He searched for about a few minutes before finding her skipping arcoss the outside of Beacon holding an umbrella, she seemed to be unorthodox with her behavour all smiles one second and then once she saw an insect her demenor changed to that of a wicked grin as she threw shards at it causing it to scurry, this in turn made her skip happily once more. Let's hope I get that nice side of her then. He gulped before heading outside.

"Hey, are you okay?" He asked she turned to him to eye him curiously tilting her head from side to side unsure of what to make of him.

"You know you're not supposed to be outside school grounds right?" He asked. She simply smiled and pointed at him.

"Me, well...I wanted to make sure a beautiful girl like you doesn't get in trouble with Ms. Goodwitch." He said with a shiver, she makes everyone in Beacon nervous. Neo smiled at his compliment and approached him, tickling his chin a bit with a smile.

"Thanks I'm flattered, my name's Jaune what's your name?" He asked. She tilted her head and put up one finger to tell him to wait and began writing down something on her scroll. After a bit she showed it to him and it said Neo.

"Neo, what a nice name." Jaune mentioned he was wondering why she isn't talking but that's probably a touchy subject for her. "So what are you up to?" She smiled again and wrote something down, when he saw it it said I'm going for a walk.

"A walk huh, that sounds nice, can I join you?" He asked. Neo smiled and nodded. Jaune was thankful that this was working so far and walked side by side with her. She forcefully grabbed his arm and linked it around hers smiling while doing so.

"Oh...um...thank you." He mentioned as they walked Is she crushing on me or just messing with me, I can't tell with her, she's too erratic. Jaune still continued with the plan as they went walking. After their walk he began his plan.

"Thank you I had a wonderful time but we should head back, but before I do I have something for you." He said, Neo looked puzzled, as Jaune presented his gift.

"Here, music, for you to listen to." He said. She took it and placed it on her ears turning it on, upon hearing it she grinned happily and gave him a thumbs up not taking it off for a second.

"Glad you like it, hope to see you again." Neo smirked and went in to kiss him, Jaune gulped but did the same, but before their lips touched she grabbed him and pinned him. She smirked at him and kissed him all over his face before winking at him. Then she went inside still listening to Jaune's tape.

What a weird girl. Jaune thought, but at least his plan worked. He got up and went inside himself, eager to way what the days to come will bring.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: Pretend to fall for Neo and give her the player...

choices: RC #1 on four new girls and who brought who.
RC #2 on four new girls and who brought who.
RC #3 on four new girls and who brought who.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
Days past and Jaune was getting nervous. He rarely saw Neo or her team except occasionally at meal times. There was no way he could check to see if it worked. He also tried to keep an eye on Team RWBY to see if the programming he did stuck. He couldn’t see anything different from them, except that it became obviously Weiss and Ruby were a couple. He felt a little proud at helping them. The reason he had limited time was because he had to train, go to class, and hang out with his team. It was finally the weekend when he was to meet Team RWBY.

He had a little time to kill before heading up to their room, so he took a quick stroll behind Beacon for some fresh air. Funny enough, he found himself at the same location he met Neo at. Shaking his head at his stupidity, he started to turn around when he felt a weight on his back and saw two legs dangling in front of him. He looked up to see the brown, pink, and white girl with mismatched eyes grinning back at him. She held up her Scroll.

Aww, you missed me.

“Ah… yeah. I couldn’t find you or you were always with your team.”

She shrugged.

“I finally meet you and I’m exhausted.” Jaune faked a yawn. “I was going to head back to my dorm and take a quick Cat Nap.”

Relief flooded through him when he realized Neo’s eyes glazed over and she fell asleep.

“Thank god.” Jaune muttered. “Neo, can you get off me?” Neo climbed off him and stood in front of him with an emotionless expression. “Er… so I was wondering. Can you talk?” Neo shook her head. “Shit, there goes that plan.” He figured he could have her write Cinder’s plan all out, but that would take a long time. He glanced at his watch and saw he was supposed to meet the other girls. One last night of fun wouldn’t kill him. “Neo,” he said slowly. “I’m going to meet up with my friends and you can come along. You will consider yourself a close friend and I’ll introduce you as such. You won’t cause me or any of them harm and nothing there will seem unusual. Do you understand?”

Neo nodded.

“Good.” Jaune smiled. “When I say ‘Awake’ and snap my fingers, you will wake up, normal, not remembering being hypnotized, and carry out my instructions.” He paused. “Awake.” He snapped his fingers.

Neo’s eyes flickered open and she grinned at him, before flicking him in the nose and gesturing to Beacon.

“Yeah, we are going.” Jaune said, leading the way.

Now that Neo was under his control, he was curious to see who Team RWBY brought along. There were a lot of girls in the school now. With nine girls under his control, he could have a lot of fun… and not the PG kind either. He reached the room and entered with Neo to see...
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: Skip to a few days later

choices: He started programming the new girls
He messed around with the current ones first
He came up with an interesting idea (RC on what)
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
"Hi Jaune." Ruby greeted with the other three giving them warm smiles behind them were four hypnotized girls standing there waiting for his instructions.

"I brought someone special for you!" Ruby sang gesturing to Pyrrha "You two have a lot to talk about." Jaune was once again confused but nodded none the less.

"Thanks Ruby I was actually planning on having my teammates involved in our fun."Anyways this is Neo, we just met and she's eager to join us as well." Neo nodded smiling at them.

"Hmm, she looks familiar." Yang squinted at the girl then shrugged. "Eh, must be imagining things, welcome aboard Neo, anyways here's who I brought." She motioned towards Coco "It wasn't an easy getting her, she's always with Velvet. Speaking of."

Blake gestured to Velvet next to her "There was literally no way to separate them, they were.....busy together." She blushed at that recollection "So Yang and I worked together to grab them both." Yang blushed as well.

"That was embarrassing to say the least." Yang tried to get the image of Coco and Velvet being intimate out of her mind.

"As for me, well." She began motioning to her older sister Winter. "Winter and I, we only had each other. That cold lifeless house I call a home and she was the only friend I had, I want her with me to experience what I've experienced."

"That was sweet of you Weiss." Jaune mentioned, he can make their choices work and with Neo he had a whole new level of fun to start. The question was did he start programming the new girls, mess around with the ones he has first or come up with something interesting?
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: RC #1 on four new girls and who brought who.

Go straight to animal and object hypnosis.
Do a different kind of play.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
“You all did well,” Jaune complimented and the girls beamed at him. “Let’s get started. Cat Nap!”

All nine girls grew lifeless.

It was important for Jaune to make sure all the girls were programmed for the fun. Team RWBY was already conditioned and it would just take some reminders, but it wouldn’t hurt to get everyone. Before he started he took the opportunity to admire the new girls.

Pyrrha, his partner, was just as attractive as ever. Polite and kind, she still kicked everyone’s butt in the ring. She was dressed casually instead of her armor, a simple red tank top and white sorts. Winter, who was standing next to her, was a splitting image of Weiss if you aged her a couple years. She was wearing the Atlas uniform and her hair was up in a bun. Velvet, a rabbit Faunus, looked as adorable as always in her simple brown and tan clothes. Coco, the fashionista with a beret and sunglasses, wore a much fancier brown and black outfit. Neo, the shortest of them all, was standing next to Jaune and he had to tell her to move with the other girls.

“Okay, ladies.” Jaune said. “Ruby explained to you that I’m a hypnotist and the rest of her team confirmed it. You were all interested for your own reasons and came to try it out. Anything that happens here does not leave the room. You will find that if I pretend to hypnotize you with a coin, you will asleep quickly, as if I’m quite skilled. The Cat Nap trigger will still apply as always. You will be much more open to suggestions and, as time passes, you will try to one up each other. Powerful Huntresses can’t lose, right?”

He figured at some point he would have to keep encouraging them to lose their inhabitations.

Now that he had the basics implanted in them, it was time to decide what to do. Did he start off like he did before? Pretend to actually do a show and focus on the new girls? The more they got hypnotized, the better the reacted to his orders. Of course, he could go straight to the animals and object hypnosis triggers. He could just make them believe they sat through the introduction already. It would save time.

There were other choices available to him too.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: He started programming the new girls

choices: Velvet's suggestion, stiff as a board
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
After some consideration he figured the hypnosis show routine was a good start. He absolutely wanted to do new things to spice things up followed by his own personal perverse fun but for right now he wanted to stick with what he knew and have it be a slow build. Having them be animals and objects was also in the cards too but again that can wait. He snapped his fingers to awaken the girls. Pyrrha was naturally the first one to greet him.

"Oh hi Jaune, it's good to see you." She smiled, he could've sworn she was blushing but it was probably his imagination. "Ruby told me about your hypnosis show and I wanted to see for it myself." Ruby was grinning ear to ear to which Pyrrha turned to her.

"Remembered what we talked about?" She added with a bit of panic in her voice, Ruby smiled and made a zip her lips motion.

"Talked about what?" He asked.

"Nothing!!" Both Ruby and Pyrrha insisted, the red haired blushing a bit when saying that. Jaune blinked a few times but paid it no mind.

"Oh boy I'm excited, I've always wanted to go on a hypnosis show for a date!" Velvet grinned, earning a blush from her girlfriend.

"Vel!" Coco hushed at her worried that exposing their relationship would cause problems.

"Oh please everyone in Beacon knows about you two, it's not that much of a secret." Yang told them. The two blushed harder at that.

"Well we suck at keeping secrets." Velvet giggled "Oh well good to know you all approve."

"Ruby and I are in one so I'm in no place to judge." Weiss commented.

"Are you now?" Winter asked, more curious than mad.

"Um...surprise?" Weiss added, her expression was neutral but Winter smiled which was rare for her.

"You finally found happiness, good for you." Winter mentioned "We'll just leave father out of the loop for obvious reasons, however." She turned to Ruby "You and I will have a chat about this." Ruby groaned.

"Oh no, now it's my turn to receive the treat her right or you die talk." Ruby panicked a bit.

"You'll live dolt." Weiss smiled "Thank you for trying this out with me sis."

"Figured we could spend time together, plus I need a break from serving Atlas." Her older sister explained.

"They won't need you for anything will they?" Jaune asked and she shook her head no.

"I asked for time off, told them I wanted to spend time with my sister, General Ironwood was kind enough to grant me it." Winter mentioned. Weiss smiled at that.

"Thanks sis." Weiss smiled at her. Neo meanwhile gave a thumbs up telling them she's good to go, Winter looked at her curiously.

"You seem familiar, have I seen you somewhere before?" She asked.

"I had the same feeling, I feel like I know her from somewhere." Yang added. Neo smiled and shook her head.

"If you say so." Winter mentioned but still couldn't shake off the feeling she looked so familiar, Yang felt the same way. Jaune panicked a bit, if Neo was as shady as he thought he was it'd make sense for Winter to know being part of the military. Though he wasn't sure how Yang knows her, perhaps they fought each other? It didn't matter, he could easily take care of this if needed.

"Well with that out of the way, let's begin the hypnosis show." Jaune began wanting to change the subject. "Who would like to go first?"

"I can go first Jaune." Pyrrah volunteered happy to help him out with this. Jaune in turn smiled at her.

"Thanks Pyrrah." He caught Ruby whisper something to her and her blushing but paid it no mind, girls will be girls after all. Pyrrah stepped up to him, looking a bit flustered but smiled nonetheless. He began his hypnosis induction onto her and per his instructions she went under fast.

"Damn you're getting better at this, didn't need to use anything this time." Yang commented.

"What can I say, it's a gift." Jaune smirked knowing full well of the truth. "So what shall she do?"

"She should do the special dance, she'll know what it means." Ruby smirked, he was confused but curious.

"Well she dresses up like an amazon, have her think she is one." Yang suggested.

"I want to see the stiff as a board trick hypnotists do." Velvet mentioned "It's where the person thinks they're a board and you can't move them no matter how hard you try, I've seen it lots on TV, looks fun." She grinned getting her camera ready. "Oh don't worry I won't share the pictures with anyone, it's for Coco and I to remember this by." Her girlfriend smiled at her for that. Jaune figured as long as they kept it to themselves her taking pictures wouldn't hurt, but with that in mind he focused on his teammate.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.title: Start off with a fun little hypnosis show.

choices: Winter volunteers because Weiss liked it and she wanted to see what it was like.
Coco volunteers her and Velvet as a pair.
Neo volunteers while winking at Jaune and blowing a kiss.
1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
“That’s one we haven’t done before,” Jaune admitted looking at Velvet. Ruby looked a little disappointed, but shook her head and grew cheerful once again. “Pyrrha, I want you to imagine yourself become a board. Thick and strong…”

“Heh.” Yang chuckled.

“…unable to move. You will not bend or break when laid down.” Jaune continued. “Feel yourself become stiffer, arms at your side, feet together.”

Pyrrha was now standing straight up, arms and legs exactly what Jaune told her. Her eyes were still closed. Jaune gestured for two chairs and Yang and Coco were all too happy to oblige. Jaune set them up and then slowly lowered Pyrrha across them. Feet on one side, head and shoulders on the other. Jaune pushed her ponytail to one side to make it slightly more comfortable. He stepped back and admired his work, before turning back to everyone else.

“Who would like to see if Pyrrha can hold you like this?” Several girls waved their hands, but Jaune pointed to Velvet. “It was your idea, so would you like to go?”

“Err…” Velvet lowered the camera.

“Go on, Bun-Bun.” Coco pushed. “Have some fun, cut lose.”

“Okay.” Velvet agreed and stood up. She walked over to Pyrrha and pushed down on her stomach with her hand. “She’s not moving… wow… she has abs.”

“”No cheating now!” Coco called out, earning a laugh from most of the audience members.

Jaune offered Velvet a hand and she stepped up on Pyrrha. There was a tiny bit of movement, but Pyrrha didn’t collapse and sink. Velvet gasped and the girls applauded. Jaune helped her back down and sent her back to her seat.

“Pyrrha, Awake!” Jaune said and, when Pyrrha woke up, she almost fell out of the chairs do to her positioned, but quickly caught herself. “How do you feel?”

“I feel fine.” She admitted. “When I was a board I felt…. Unmoving. I didn’t even think about the fact Velvet stood on me.”

“Thanks for volunteering,” Jaune whispered. “It helped me a lot and I’ll make it up to you later, promise.” Pyrrha’s face flushed slightly and she headed back to her seat to discuss something with Ruby. “Okay, who would like to go next?”

"Really?!" She beamed at the idea and Coco smiled at her.

"Don't want to go up there without you Bun-Bun." She smiled causing her girlfriend to blush, they gazed into each other's eyes before Yang snapped them back to reality.

"On with the show first, you two getting a room later." Yang mentioned causing them to blush and both stepped on to face Jaune hand in hand.

"Alright hypnotist, do your worst." Coco said with a smirk with Velvet looking a bit nervous when she said that.

"Coco, stop saying things like that." She mentioned.

Jaune smirked at this and began his new hypnosis trick, which of course put them both under a trance.

Neo began writing something done, and revealed it to say have them strip tease. She smiled at that. The others blushed and how casual she suggested it.

She maybe weird but she's ballsy. Jaune admitted.

"Maybe we can boost Velvet's confidence to prevent Cardin from picking on her and Coco can be her coach?" Pyyrah mentioned. Jaune scowled at his name having his own problems with him, putting him in his place is definitely something he would like to happen sooner rather than later. Then again the singing idea was tempting, the strip tease even more so. He thought about it before reaching a decision.

1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
“Don’t think I’m licensed to perform long term personality adjustments,” Jaune said to Pyrrha.

“I’m glad you understand that,” Winter said. “If you don’t know what you are doing, things could actually get worse.”

“And Neo.” Jaune looked at her. “Careful making suggestions like that or when it’s finally your turn, they might turn the tables.”

Neo rolled her eyes and mage a dismissive gestured before puffing her chest up proudly. Yang smirked and leaned toward Blake to whisper something. Judging by her sigh, it wasn’t anything good.

“I kind of like Weiss’s suggestion to get them to sing,” Jaune told them. “Anyone have some duet music?”

“Got you covered,” Ruby said and tossed Jaune her Scroll.

“Wait… isn’t this the one you had to dance…”

“AHHH!” Ruby cut him off as Yang started laughing. “Don’t remind them.”

“Okay, Velvet, Coco,” Jaune told them. “When the music starts, you will find you can’t stop singing as long as it’s playing. When the music stops, you will release what you are doing.”

He stepped back and clicked play.

Both girls stood up and started singing. Velvet actually had a pretty nice singing voice, though Coco was a little flat. However, Coco was willing to swap a little to the music.

“Weiss,” Jaune whispered. “Can you toss me your TV remote?” Weiss obliged and Jaune walked over to Coco. “When I give you this remote, you will believe it’s a mic and start dancing while singing. You really want to impress the audience.”

The second Jaune put the remote in her hand, Coco started pacing back and forth along the stage swinging her hips, spinning, and doing all the dance moves she seemed to be able to think of. Velvet must have gotten some confidence from her because she started to move her hands and hips to the music too. The song finally ended and both girls stopped and started blinking rapidly.

“Very funny.” Coco told him, though she was grinning.

“I can’t believe we did that.” Moaned poor Velvet, though one butt slap from Coco and she scampered back to her seat.

“We have two people who haven’t had a chance to go yet,” Jaune announced. “Would one of you two lovely ladies like to volunteer?”

“Smooth lover boy!” Yang called from the crowd, earning a laugh from everyone. Jaune flushed slightly and tried to avoid Neo making kissy faces at him.

Jaune grinned.

When you take up, you will become her own personal cheerleader. Your entire purpose in life is to make her happy. The second I saw ‘Awake’ and snap my fingers, you will wake up and begin. When I saw ‘Return to Normal,’ you will become your old self again. Awake!” He snapped his fingers.

1343323321212313221233332112312111313221.content:
Pyrrha and Jaune locked gazes and he could see her nervously biting the corner of her mouth. For someone who won tournaments in front of thousands of people, Jaune was a little surprised she actually got nervous. They slowly leaned towards each other and their lips met. It was slow and awkward first, but the kiss grew in intensity. Tongues started dancing together and Pyrrha’s arms were wrapped tightly around Jaune. After several minutes, they broke apart.

“I’ve… wanted that for a long time.” Pyrrha admitted, her face turning the same shade of red as her hair.

“I wish I hadn’t been so blind,” Jaune told her. “We could have had so much more time to spend together.”

“What now?” She asked.

“Well, I assume Nora will want to know and throw some kind of party.” Pyrrha giggled. “Plus, she’ll get upset if we don’t tell her.”

“I could see that,” Pyrrha agreed with a nod. “Do you believe in fate?’ She asked suddenly.

“Fate?” Jaune looked at her and shrugged. “A little? Maybe. I like to think we can make our own decisions.”

“When we first met,” Pyrrha continued. “I felt something when we met. It was more than just you seeing me as Pyrrha and not Pyrrha the champion. That was only a small part of it. When we met, I felt a connection. It was one of the reasons I used my spear to catch you.”

“And the fact I needed help?” Jaune questioned with a small smile.

“Yes, that too.” They sat on the bed. “The more time we spent together, the more I enjoyed your company. I never confessed because you were into Weiss and if you decided you didn’t like me the same way, it might have created friction for the team.”

“If you had asked me then,” Jaune admitted. “I probably would have declined you feelings. Because I did like Weiss a lot then. Now, she’s more of a friend. I don’t know what the future will bring with us, but I want to try. And, regardless what happens, I’ll always be your friend Pyr.”

“Oh, Jaune.” She wrapped her arms around his neck and kissed him again. “I love you so much.”

“It’s happening!”

Jaune and Pyrrha turned to the doorway, seeing a familiar girl with orange hair. Nora had the widest smile on her face as she turned to Ren.

“We need to celebrate!”

Jaune and Pyrrha both laughed.

“Salutations, Ruby!”

Ruby spun around and a smile exploded on her face.

“Penny!” She dashed forward and hugged her friend. “You’re at Beacon?!”

“I’ll be here for the entire festival,” Penny said cheerfully. “I was hoping to see you again.” Ruby looked around and saw no one else.

“Don’t you normally have some kind of guard or something watching you?” Ruby asked. “Because… you know… beep boop?” She made robot moves and noises.

Penny laughed.

“No, as long as I stay in Beacon.” Penny gestured to the window. “Should I wish to go to Vale, I will need an escort. It took some convincing from my father and I, but General Ironwood finally allowed me to have some personal freedom.”

“You should totally come to our weekly get together,” Ruby said instantly. “We get together every Saturday night. Play games, hang out, and just have fun.”

“That sounds wonderful!” Penny clapped her hands excitedly. “Do I need to rbing anything?”

“Nope.” Ruby reached into her pocket to pull out the music player. “But while you’re hear, you should totally listen to this. It’s a great song and a lot of us listen to it. You might want to brush up on it before then.”

“I shall do so post haste.” Penny said, putting the earbud in her ear. “Would you like to accompany me around the school? There is so much I have yet to see.”

“I would love too,” Ruby admitted. “But I need to meet up with my team. Here, let’s exchange Scroll numbers so we can talk.”

“My first social contact. How exciting!”

Once Ruby and Penny parted ways, Ruby rushed back to her dorm. There she found the rest of her team.

“Guys!” She cried, as the door shut behind her. “I just gave the music to Penny. She can come Saturday.”

“If you’re just going to give it to anyone, you made my list void.” Weiss sighed, throwing a piece of paper into the trash. “I should have known you would just invite the first person you saw.”

“Yang was the same way.” Blake said. “She invited a girl from another team and passed over the music.”

“Neon’s a party girl and one cool kat.” Blake groaned at Yang’s puns, but the others didn’t get it yet. “I figured she would like to party and her roommates told her she can’t drink this weekend. Turns out, she’s a lot like Nora when that happens.” Ruby and Weiss shivered.

"H-hey Weiss... what are you doing out here?" he stammered. She looked back, glaring at him with fury burning in her eyes.

An hour had passed, and Jaune had fallen asleep. His eyes slowly opened, and there, a little ways away from him, was Weiss.

"Oh. Hey." he said as he saw her.

"Well, just uh... sit down here and we can get started" he said, pulling out his golden pocket watch and holding it in front of her face.

"Okay. Just watch this with your eyes. Just keep them focused on it. Watch as it sways back and forth. See the glint of the sunlight on it, making it shine beautifully. Listen to the gentle whoosh of the air brushing past it. Find that these sounds, and these sights, bring you comfort. They let you relax. Make you feel safe." Weiss's arms slowly go from crossed, to sitting neatly in her lap, and her head begins to sway with the watch.

"Take a deep breath. And Exhale. Then a deep breath. And exhale. Continue this pattern. Let it bring you peace. Let it fill you with relaxation" Weiss's breathing became more pronounced. More obvious. Her chest pulsing slowly, and her eyes beginning to squint.

"Look at the watch. You like how it looks, don't you? It makes you feel comforted. The glint of the sunlight hitting it. Like curling up by a warm fire in the winter. Feel that gentle heat on you. The warm, comforting feeling sweeping over your body. You can see the fire in the watch, can't you?"

Weiss slowly nods, a very small smile finding itself on her lips.

"Now, you feel stressed, don't you? Stressed because you can't focus. You want to fix that. You want to focus. You don't want to stress. Focus on the watch. FOCUS on it. Until it is all that you see, and my voice is all that you hear. When you reach that stage, just nod for me."

Weiss stares another ten... twenty... thirty seconds. Her head slowly bobs, confirming that her attention was clear.

"You've focused, Weiss. At least for now. But the stress makes it hard to keep that focus. You'd like to get rid of that stress. You know what creates stress? Failure. Worry. Anger. Sadness... just thinking in general. To get rid of the stress, you need to stop thinking, don't you? But that's hard. It's hard to not think. But what if I said I could do the thinking for you. Take away the stress of thinking. Would you like that?"

She slowly nods again.

"You'll find that in a moment I'm going to pass my hand in front of your face. When I do, your eyes will drift shut. When they do, you will be fully in a trance. Fully focused on my voice. Your thoughts will be gone. Held and controlled by me to get rid of your stress. Do you understand?"

Weiss nodded once more. Jaune slowly waved his hand down her face, and her head dropped. Her eyes gently swooped shut, and she was in a trance.
